Attribute.Name: title
Attribute.Value: Graduate Mechanical Engineering Curriculum - Carnegie Mellon

Attribute.Name: description
Attribute.Value: "Whether pursuing a Master???s degree or a Ph.D., the Carnegie Mellon mechanical engineering graduate student participates in an intense program designed to hone professional skills and talents. Academic activity is balanced with hands-on research opportunities to create an interdisciplinary approach to problem solving. It is this combined emphasis on fundamentals, the ability to think and work outside of one's area of expertise and the ability to frame complex problems that best defines our graduate program."
